page.title: 13FACE ENTERPRISE SCHEME
page.content: The Hon.Peter Morrison Minister of State for the Department of Employment opened this Arts and Crafts unit at the Old Brewery,Golden Hill, Wiveliscombe on 11/7/85.The Man Power Services Commision is supporting this base for the West Somerset local unit of the FACE youth training course, which organises,monitors and reviews the progress of trainees on the Handskills Business Course.Twelve trainees between the ages of 17 and 20 are extending their individual skills as blacksmiths,toymakers,silversmiths, weavers,dressmakers,potters,picture framers,woodworkers and tailors.Each course covers 23 weeks of 35 hours.Those aged 17-18 get Â£26.25 and those19+ Â£38 per week.The scheme aims to create new occupational opportunities in the small business sector.
